name: DevBatch
description:
From startups to fortune 500 companies, DevBatch has shared success with businesses around the globe. Since our inception, we have grown from one man’s endeavor to one big team of software engineers, creative designers, business strategists and marketing experts.
Our services portfolio entails mobility, big data, CRM Solutions (Salesforce), enterprise solutions (SharePoint), digital marketing, social media & workplace reimagination, cloud, AI and IoT.
In all of our services, we bring you inspiring concepts, ideas, and plans that have infinite possibilities and market endurance. Our expertise in business intelligence helps entrepreneurs, startups, enterprises, and agencies grow their revenues by making informed decisions.
Our CMMI L3 is in progress and we’re a certified Microsoft BizSpark Partner. We set high aims, this being just a jumbled start towards our long-term goals to become a pioneer in IT solutions recognized on a global level.
READ MORE...
